summary: Similar to Cheryl, Sierra is a Magic Gunner.
descriptionHtml:
Used to be vigilant of Stedarr when she first arrived to skyrim under uga0216's guidance.
However, the process of gaining her current abilities led her to getting kicked out of the organization. (Maybe due to meeting Cheryl??)
Down and out, she now resides in Nightgate Inn waiting to get hired (1 gold ingot).

Like Cheryl, her fighting style dual wields guns.
Unlike Cheryl, her gun abilities are different. She does not have her guns like Cheryl all the time as well.

I'm using the ragged trousers mod for her to be half naked.
If you use vanilla trousers she will look like any prisoner.

Requirements:
You do not need any follower mods to recruit her even when you have recruited another follower.

Choose follower Sierra under the link below.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59683/?
author: fantasy19
